nodes.text: This Purkoll citizen was a male Skakoan who was employed by Foreman Wat Tambor of the Techno Union. During the Clone Wars, the scientist worked at the Union's headquarters, Skako Minor. This scientist accompanied Tambor and another scientist to capture Clone Force 99, Captain Rex and Jedi General Anakin Skywalker whom trespassed on the planet to find Echo, an ARC trooper whom was presumed dead at the Battle of Lola Sayu but had actually survived and was taken into Separatist custody and sold to the Techno Union; and afterwards transformed into a cyborg. However, the Republic forces managed to escape capture and also were successful in rescuing Echo.
